website_summaries.verdict: Your best option if you're looking for a shower gel that's actually moisturizing.
pros: Moisturizing and nourishing mineral-based shower gel
Lathers well without needing to use a lot of product
Suitable for use on sensitive skin
cons: While some complain that there is little scent, others find the scent to be unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this body wash
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this body wash. I have psoriasis and it seems to be the only product that doesn’t make it worse and might even help it. The only thing I’m upset about this time around when ordering was that the seal was broken and a lot of it had spilled out into the envelope. This product is not cheap. Can you please make sure you put the plastic seal around it so it can’t break open? Love your product though and your face wash!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Borowski

customer_reviews.title: You will be disappointed ifthey have on their hand lotion and there isn't any so very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product I opened it and couldn't wait to use it but when I used it in the shower there was like no fragrance to get it all how I healed the hand lotion and that smells great and that's why I bought this shower gel but there wasn't any fragrance and I'm so disappointed cuz usually whatever I wash with in the shower as a pleasant fragrance to it and this one didn't have any I just took it out of the shower and put it in the cabinet because I have others that do have fragrance just all-around disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Great product but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but for the price I feel like they could have come up with a better dispenser. Every time I need to use it, I struggle with the pump top, and being in the shower, don’t have my glasses on and therefore can’t read what direction to turn the top! If I spend that much for shower gel I don’t want a flimsy dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Nice value, scent is just ok
customer_reviews.text: I wish the gel was available in its classic wonderful Ahava scent. The company has changed it to mild green apple. Nice and pleasant, but not as enjoyable as it used to be. I miss the old formula. It is disappointing when perfect cosmetic products are changed for the worse. This shower gel now smells close to children’s Suave’s Juicy Apple, albeit not as strong.
customer_reviews.author: Pied Piper

customer_reviews.title: Works well with my dry sensative skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive dry skin. I use this and moisture body wrap lotion by neutrogena. My skin is not dry and itchy anymore. Package did come damaged but received a replacement quickly with no problems. The bottle leaked during the mailing process.
customer_reviews.author: hp

customer_reviews.title: second time buying
customer_reviews.text: I take care of my elderly mother who has dementia, so I give her showers. She is very sensitive to soaps and body washes. I received a free one to try and low and behold it was great for her. I have sense purchased two more times. I find it a little pricey but its definitely worth it if you are allergic to fragranced products. It has a clean smell, soaps up very good and gentle enough. I will continue to buy , plus I love Ahava products anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wehunt

customer_reviews.title: it is wonderful for dry skin and no perfume
customer_reviews.text: I am in a chlorine treated pool three days a week, needless to say ,it dries out my skin ,ahava shower is only product I use now ,it is wonderful for dry skin and no perfume , this is my second order and will continue to order in the future

product_meta.title: AHAVA Dead Sea Mineral Shower Gel
product_meta.description:
Size:17 Fl Oz

 " 

 MINERAL SHOWER GEL 

 • Gentle, daily shower gel cleans and hydrates skin
• Made with Aloe Vera extract and skin-smoothing conditioners
• Aromatic pomegranate and cherry blossom scent 

 Start the day caring for the skin you’re in with a gentle shower gel that hydrates and leaves you feeling refreshed and relaxed by its aromatic signature scent. 

 KEY BENEFITS
Hydrating
Moisturizing
Nourishing 

 THIS PRODUCT IS
Hypoallergenic
Vegan
Paraben-free 

 HOW TO USE 

 Apply a small amount in hands or on wet washcloth or loofah.
Lather well and wash body.
Rinse off thoroughly. 

 Made with our signature mineral catalyst, Osmoter, that builds strong skin by activating its own moisture reserves. 

 Aqua (Mineral Spring Water), Ammonium Lauryl Sulfate & Aqua (Water), Zinc Coceth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Phenoxyethanol & Ethylhexylglycerin, Maris Sal (Dead Sea Water), Hydroxyethylcellulose, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Allantoin, Potassium Sorbate, Parfum (Fragrance), Biosaccharide Gum-1. 

 " 



BRAND STORY
AHAVA is the definitive Dead Sea Minerals beauty expert. All AHAVA products contain Osmoter - an exclusive, perfectly-balanced blend of Dead Sea Minerals that recharge, rehydrate and illuminate skin.
